channel.title: How to fix drops on [PI] Marcbobs version?
channel.description: all npcs have drop sets but drops are disabled appearently as ive read like 100 posts but i just dont get how to make npc's drop items? EVERYTHING IS SET JUST THEY DONT DROP

item.title: How to fix drops on [PI] Marcbobs version?

item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

could it be this?

						dropItems(i); // npc drops items!

i was just looking around in my pi source lol thinking i could find a fix to mtp drops

item.title: How to fix drops on [PI] Marcbobs version?
item.dc:creator: @mithpkz mithpkz
item.description:
@mithpkz wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=sonsofgod2 link=topic=466522.msg3412007#msg3412007 date=1290752838]
no ucant if its mtp v2. it wont matc dude is a noob and didnt add drops
[/quote]You can too fix it, as I’ve done it before.

It’s fairly simple, but I don’t feel as if I should tell anyone.

@OP; Hint: Check the NPCHandler and the item packets.[/quote]

why not just say whats the big deal…

is it this??

return Misc.random(NPCDrops.dropRarity.get(npcs[i].npcType)) == 0;
